extendedInfo.description: Decorate boy's or girl's room with Jessie's colorful paintings with wide selection of themes in zoo animals, cars, fairies, flowers, and even more. All paintings are originally designed and painted by Jessie, and you can choose either hand painted or printed on canvas. Jessie has bachelor degree in Art with twelve years design and painting experience in oil painting on canvas, black ceramic, and water color painting.Visit http://childrensartoncanvas.com to get more information about Jessie's children artworks.

reviews.title: It\'s a gallery
reviews.comment: It just links you to a website to buy over priced items you could do yourself easily
reviews.author: A Google User
